CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(ffirule__ListObject__c==null,ffirule__ListObject__c == '' ) ,
'<apex:page standardController="' + ffirule__IntegrationRule__r.ffirule__SourceObject__c + '" extensions="ffirule.IntegrationRuleEngine" action="'+'{'+'!'+'convert'+'}'+'" recordSetVar="records" lightningStylesheets="true">' + BR() +'<ffirule:IntegrationRule engine="'+'{'+'!'+'engine'+'}'+'"/>'+ BR() +'</apex:page>',
'<apex:page standardController="' + ffirule__ListObject__c + '" extensions="ffirule.IntegrationRuleEngine" action="'+'{'+'!'+'convert'+'}'+'" recordSetVar="records" lightningStylesheets="true">' + BR() +'<ffirule:IntegrationRule engine="'+'{'+'!'+'engine'+'}'+'"/>'+ BR() +'</apex:page>')
CustomField.label: List Button
